Compute_Future_Profits: Calculate the interest on the capital
To_update: To update your legal name and country
We_promise_you_secure_payment: We promise you a 100% secure payment
deposit_congress: Congratulations, your transaction is completed and was successfully added to your funds.
deposit_method_or_please_contact_our: deposit method or please contact our
your_withdraw_email: Your withdrawal will be processed and you will receive the funds in 1-7 business days
Your_payment_info_is_secure_and_will_nev: Your payment info is secure and will never be shared
our_bank: Our bank requires your bank details in order to process your withdrawal. Any withdrawals made via Wire Transfer will be returned to the same account from which you deposited.
eth_text: Minimum withdrawal is €25.00. Your withdrawal will have €8.00 subtracted from your remaining balance to cover the fee required to process the transaction.
btc_text: Minimum withdrawal is €20.00. Your withdrawal will have €2.50 subtracted from your remaining balance to cover the fee required to process the transaction.
ltc_text: Minimum withdrawal is €10.00. Your withdrawal will have €0.05 subtracted from your remaining balance to cover the fee required to process the transaction.
mandate_text: By providing your IBAN and confirming this payment, you are authorizing Rocketship Inc. and Stripe, our payment service provider, to send instructions to your bank to debit your account and your bank to debit your account in accordance with those instructions. You are entitled to a refund from your bank under the terms and conditions of your agreement with your bank. A refund must be claimed within 8 weeks starting from the date on which your account was debited.
your_withdraw_email_crypto: Your withdrawal will be processed and after the confirmations on the blockchain your funds will be credited to your account.
in_case: In case that your country of residence and the country of issue of your ID are different, please upload your Passport.
documents_must: Documents must meet the following requirements:
Full_copy: Full copy of the document showing all 4 corners
bank_statement: Please upload your utility bill or bank statement.
doc_follow: Documents must meet the following requirements:
Full_copy_of_the_document_showing_all_co: Full copy of the document showing all 4 corners
your_physical: Your physical address, matching the address you have used when registering for the account
Utility_Bill: Must be a Utility Bill (electricity, water, telephone, gas /energy, council tax/sanitation bills) or a Bank statement
for_further: For further documentation, please attach them on an email and send to
Name: Name
Welcome_back: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
Don_have_an_account: Don't have an account? Sign Up
Let_get_started_with_your_journey: Let's get started with your journey in Dealence.
Check_your_email_to_reset_your_password: Check your email (also spam) to reset your password
password_link: Enter your email to receive a reset password link
Receive_the: Receive the 7.2% every two months on your balance
Receive_the_every: Receive the 30% every six months on your balance
The_amount_must: The amount must be multiple of €500
Add_photos: Add photos or a pdf of your documents to verify your identity
Enter_different_password: Enter a different password from the previous one
Password_correctly_updated: Password correctly updated, please try to login
Problem_resetting: Problem resetting password. Please send another reset link
ft_txt: Dealence is the first platform where you can contribute to entrepreneurial projects and receive a percentage of the profits generated.
the_info: The information and documents have been successfully submitted. Please wait for a confirmation e-mail.
unable: Unable to save data, please check the form and try again.
